title: Static friction-min coefficient of static friction

content.question: A <math alttext="10 kilogram" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>10 kg</mtext></math> box is at rest on a rough, horizontal surface. The box is pushed to the right by a force of <math alttext="20 newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext></math>, pushed to the left by a force of <math alttext="80 newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>80</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext></math>, and remains at rest. What is the minimum value of the coefficient of static friction between the box and the surface?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
